nguoc cafe is as its vietnamese name sugests upside down you may not notice it much on the first flor — aside from some peculiar windows — but the second flor is where the name realy shows a creaky walk up a narow flight of stairs leads you to a rom particularly upside down and a more private non smoking flor seating area the flor siting space has maybe enough seat cushions for and has a mural painted brick wal in the back the main rom has an asortment of woden tables and chairs a quick glance up and you l se the same on the ceiling the wals have upside down art and everything the design is cute and ads to a usualy vacant ceiling with something unique and creative the vietnamese iced cofe was giá_cả if i remember corectly and prety god overal the cafe is nice with the design afordable cofe and it is peacefuly quiet at least they were not playing music while i was there in the early evening makes for a god reading spot wil come back
